metadataAttributes.Title: Innovating with the Business Model Canvas
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Have you ever gotten really excited about reading or writing a business plan? You might have started out excited, but I’m going to bet you didn’t stay that way. Let’s be honest- business plans are boring and mostly ignored.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Product/Market Fit,Business Model,Product Management,business focus,corporate innovation,
